nodes.text: Morseerians were a sentient species native to the planet Merj, that had elongated, conical heads, four arms, and a methane-based respiration. The species was not able to distinguish human faces. Shortly before the Battle of Yavin, one such alien, a male named Nabrun Leids, attended the cantina of Mos Eisley the day Obi-Wan Kenobi and Luke Skywalker met Han Solo and Chewbacca.
